1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Asim bin Laqit bin Sabrah that his father said:"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah! Tell me about ablution.' He said: 'Perform ablution properly and sniff water up into your nostrils, thoroughly, unless you are fasting

chapter.eng-name: Going to extremes in sniffing water up into the nostrils and blowing it out
